DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: ALVES C.;ALVES C.A.;ANDRADE ALVES, CESAR;ALVES, CESAR ANDRADE;ALVES, CSAR ANDRADE

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Doutor em Teologia pela Pontifcia Universit Gregoriana (2008), Mestre em Teologia pela Faculdade Jesuta de Filosofia e Teologia (2000), Bacharel em Teologia pela Faculdade Jesuta de Filosofia e Teologia (1998) e Bacharel em Cincias Biolgicas pela Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro (1983). Presbtero da Companhia de Jesus. Leciona Teologia desde 2002. Atualmente professor do quadro do Departamento de Teologia da Faculdade Jesuta de Filosofia e Teologia (FAJE) na Graduao e no Programa de Ps-Graduao e pesquisador no mesmo Departamento. membro da Comisso Editorial da revista Perspectiva Teolgica e diretor da Coleo FAJE.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: S.T.D. from Pontificia Universit Gregoriana (2008), M.A. in Theology from the Faculdade Jesuta de Filosofia e Teologia (2000), B.A. in Theology from the Faculdade Jesuta de Filosofia e Teologia (1998) and B.S. in Biology from Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro (1983). Presbyter of the Society of Jesus. He teaches Theology since 2002. Currently he is professor of the permanent staff of the Department of Theology at Faculdade Jesuta de Filosofia e Teologia (FAJE) in the Degree and Postgraduate Programs and researcher in the same Department. He is a member of the Editorial Committee of Perspectiva Teolgica and director of the collection FAJE.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: Para uma hermenutica apropriada do Vaticano II. O discurso inaugural de Joo XXIII
La rivelazione nella Correctio Filialis e nella Dei Verbum

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: The document Correctio filialis de haeresibus propagatis has been electronically published last year. It blames Pope Francis on themes of Moral Theology that appear especially in the apostolic exhortation Amoris laetitia. Correctio filialis also discloses its own concept of revelation. Here we show this subject in the field of Fundamental Theology. We analyze this concept of revelation that lies in the background of the gap between its supporters and the Pope. Two different revelation paradigms are particularly considered. The concept of revelation adopted by Correctio filialis is part of a larger, specific and vigorous revelation paradigm. Such paradigm, however, is not that of the depositum fidei. This one is also considered. These findings shed light on the current debate about Pope Francis? positions.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: A ESCATOLOGIA CRIST NO PROGNOSTICUM FUTURI SAECULI DE JULIANO DE TOLEDO
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: Christian Eschatology in Julian of Toledo's Prognosticum futuri saeculi

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Contents:
Introduction
1. Sitz im Leben and nature of the work
2. Julian's method and aim
3. Accomplished Eschatology (the Christ event) and present Eschatology (before the believer's death)
4. Future Eschatology (after the believer's death)
5. Synopsis of the work' s title and subtitles
Conclusion
Bibliographical references

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES:
Summary:
Preface by Mario de Frana Miranda.
Author?s Foreword.

Introduction.
1. A clear interest in the last decades.
2. A challenge from Modern Science to Theology.
3. Literature at the interface between Science and Theology.
4. The route plan ahead.

Chapter 1: Definition, importance, facilitations and hindrances.
1.1 The importance of Method.
1.2 Cultural influences that help or hinder.

Chapter 2: Starting to outline Theological Method.
2.1 Patristic Period.
2.2 Scholastic Period.
2.3 Considerations.

Chapter 3: Outlining Scientific Method.
3.1 Steps or movements of the Scientific Method.
3.2 Assumptions of the Scientific Method.
3.3 Considerations.

Chapter 4: Further outlining of Theological Method.
4.1 Theology in Science Classification.
4.2 Scientific Status of Theology.
4.3 Some differences between Theological Method and Scientific Method.
4.4 Some similarities between Theological Method and Scientific Method.
4.5 Scientific articles in Theology.

Conclusion.

Bibliographical references.
Index of contents.
